author: Martin-Grunewald
body:
This PR addresses the HLT menu changes in #7589.
It makes the HLT config changes properly so that they do not get
overwritten when the HLT menus are updated from ConfDB.
This PR can go in even before #7589, because the module implements fillDescriptions(.)
which will put the removed parameters.
title: HLT config fix for TrackerTopologyEP (#7589)
